title: Autodoc template not working for variables
description:
The //!! autodoc template trigger does not work for variable declarations.

Currently, the //!! trigger works for functions but not for variables. For example, typing:

int my_var; //!!

Should generate an autodoc template for the variable like:
//! @decl my_var
//! @type int

But currently this does not work.

The autodoc snippet feature is implemented in packages/pike-lsp-server/src/features/editing/autodoc.ts
close_reason: Implemented AutoDoc template support for variable declarations

title: Improve Pike Autodoc rendering in Hover
description: Parse and render Pike Autodoc block tags (@mapping, @member, etc) and inline tags (@rfc, @url) as Markdown.

title: Workspace-wide symbol search for Find References
description:
Implement workspace-wide symbol search for Find References feature.

Currently, references are only searched in open documents (documentCache). Users expect to find references in all workspace files, not just those currently open.

Implementation steps (from spec):
1. Phase 1: Add workspace scanner service - scan for all .pike/.pmod files on startup, watch for changes
2. Phase 2: On-demand indexing - read and parse files on-demand when references are requested
3. Phase 3 (optional): Background indexing - index files during idle time

Key files to modify:
- services/workspace-scanner.ts (NEW)
- features/navigation/references.ts (use workspace scanner for search)
- features/advanced/code-lens.ts (use workspace-wide count)

Success criteria:
- Find References shows results from unopened workspace files
- Performance: workspace with 100+ Pike files completes in <500ms
close_reason: Implemented workspace-wide symbol search for Find References. Added WorkspaceScanner service that discovers all .pike/.pmod files in workspace and updated references handler to search uncached workspace files on-demand.
